description: You passively accumulate up to 20 insight stacks while near enemies.  Each insight stack increases all damage dealt by 1 until your next attack.  Insight greatly favors perceptive warriors.
You gain a +25 dodge chance if you have at least 10 insight stacks.
You accumulate up to 20 insight stacks even from enemies you can't see.  You can perceive unseen enemies within 10 tiles if you have at least 10 insight stacks.
You can accumulate an infinite number of insight stacks.
Whenever you kill an enemy in melee, you retain 50% of your insight stacks.
If you have been blind for at least 15 turns, every time you would gain an insight stack you instead gain 5.
Insight stacks also increase the accuracy of ranged bow and crossbow attacks by 2% per stack.  Ranged attacks will consume insight stacks.
Insight stacks also increase the damage of ranged bow and crossbow attacks by 1% per stack.
